trans-unit.source: Click on the chart, and then use the LEFT ARROW or RIGHT ARROW keys to scroll. To select, use SHIFT-LEFT ARROW or SHIFT-RIGHT ARROW. To zoom in on the selection, use the ENTER key. To go to the previous view, use the BACKSPACE key.
trans-unit.target: Click on the chart, and then use the LEFT ARROW or RIGHT ARROW keys to scroll. To select, use SHIFT-LEFT ARROW or SHIFT-RIGHT ARROW. To zoom in on the selection, use the ENTER key. To go to the previous view, use the BACKSPACE key.
